quests.description: I'm just a normal upstanding citizen, fascinated by Kado Thorne's security systems.
quests.shortDescription: Alert a security camera

quests.name: Talk to Nolan Chance
quests.description: Talk to Nolan Chance
quests.shortDescription: Alright, you got me. I'm up to something. Come talk to me if that intrigues you.

quests.name: Destroy cameras and turrets
quests.description: Destroy cameras and turrets
quests.shortDescription: Take out the dangerous tech so you can case the joint.

quests.name: Crouch near a Low Card guard for 5 seconds without alerting them
quests.description: Crouch near a Low Card guard for 5 seconds without alerting them
quests.shortDescription: Ideally we'll get in and get out without anybody noticing us. How stealthy can you be?

quests.name: Search safes and holo chests
quests.description: Search safes and holo chests
quests.shortDescription: Familiarize yourself with different locking systems. If you need keys... I'm selling a few.

quests.name: Damage a Dealer or Revenant Kado Thorne at Thorne's Strongholds
quests.description: Damage a Dealer or Revenant Kado Thorne at Thorne's Strongholds
quests.shortDescription: Those guys are tough. But you got this, right?

quests.name: Search Chests at Thorne's Sanctums in a single match
quests.description: Search Chests at Thorne's Sanctums in a single match
quests.shortDescription: Heisting is actually pretty simple. Get in. Get out. And don't get caught.

quests.name: Deploy a scanner in the vault
quests.description: Deploy a scanner in the vault
quests.shortDescription: Whatever Slone wants is in that vault. I just need confirmation.

quests.name: Speak with and Hire Nolan Chance
quests.description: Speak with and Hire Nolan Chance
quests.shortDescription: You talked to Antonia?! I, uh...hmm. I'll help you out if you fill me in.

quests.name: Gather the heist crew by speaking with Peely Bone, Countess Daraku, and Arctic Assassin
quests.description: Gather the heist crew by speaking with Peely Bone, Countess Daraku, and Arctic Assassin
quests.shortDescription: If we can't find recruits on this Island, I'll have to call in my probably-still-angry old crew...

quests.name: Search Heist Bags
quests.description: Search Heist Bags
quests.shortDescription: If we're gonna pull this heist off, we'll need everything I've hidden in my caches.

quests.name: Talk to Antonia
quests.description: Talk to Antonia
quests.shortDescription: Nolan thinks he's the mastermind, but my plan is better. And more fun.

quests.name: Eliminate opponents with suppressed weapons
quests.description: Eliminate opponents with suppressed weapons
quests.shortDescription: They have gear. You want gear. Take 'em out.

quests.name: Get through a hallway guarded by Laser Alarms
quests.description: Get through a hallway guarded by Laser Alarms
quests.shortDescription: Those laser alarms are complicated. The faster you can get past them, the better.

quests.name: Exceed 70 Speed while driving a vehicle
quests.description: Exceed 70 Speed while driving a vehicle
quests.shortDescription: Piper was my getaway driver. We go way back. But you'll need to get her attention first. - Nolan

quests.name: Talk to Piper Pace
quests.description: Talk to Piper Pace
quests.shortDescription: Now that you've demonstrated that you can keep up, drop her a line. Use my name. - Nolan

quests.name: Collect muscle car parts
quests.description: Collect muscle car parts
quests.shortDescription: If I'm getting back in the game, I'm overdue for a tune-up. Find me some spare parts. - Piper

quests.name: Pick up a pizza at Slappy Shores and deliver it to Mega City
quests.description: Complete a speedy XL pizza delivery from Slappy Shores to Mega City
quests.shortDescription: I need more track time to get back in shape. Which means YOU gotta cover my shift at the Pit. - Piper

quests.name: Deploy a Pizza Party at one of Thorne's Strongholds
quests.description: Deploy a Pizza Party at one of Thorne's Strongholds
quests.shortDescription: Here's my favorite trick: bring a pizza and look confused, and you can case any joint. - Piper

quests.name: Steal bars from Thorne's Strongholds
quests.description: Steal bars from Thorne's Strongholds
quests.shortDescription: I heard Thorne's goons didn't tip you. As your new friend, let's remedy that situation. - Piper

quests.name: Destroy cameras or turrets within 90 seconds of entering Thorne's Strongholds
quests.description: Destroy cameras or turrets within 90 seconds of entering Thorne's Strongholds
quests.shortDescription: You can drive... but let's see how quick you are on your feet. - Piper

quests.name: Eliminate Low Card Guards within 90 seconds of entering Thorne's Strongholds
quests.description: Eliminate Low Card Guards within 90 seconds of entering Thorne's Strongholds
quests.shortDescription: I'm not gonna heist with you 'til I know you can handle the heat. - Piper

quests.name: Steal a legendary or better item from Thorne's Stronghold and escape
quests.description: Steal a legendary or better item from Thorne's Stronghold and escape
quests.shortDescription: Get in, get out, and get to the getaway car. Show me what you can do. - Piper

quests.name: Collect the Ring from Thorne's vault
quests.description: Collect the Ring from Thorne's vault
quests.shortDescription: If Nolan wants Antonia back on his team, it's gonna cost him some major carats. - Piper

quests.name: Give the Ring to Antonia
quests.description: Give the Ring to Antonia
quests.shortDescription: Ooh, a card! "Antonia, I'm very very very very sorry." What a wordsmith. - Piper

quests.name: Drive distance with Piper Pace hired
quests.description: Drive distance with Piper Pace hired
quests.shortDescription: With that all settled, I think it's time for some professional bonding. Let's hit the road! - Piper

quests.name: Visit Slappy Shores and Mega City in a single match
quests.description: Visit Slappy Shores and Mega City in a single match
quests.shortDescription: It turns out professional circuit drivers have teammates. Interested? - Piper

quests.name: Mantle structures
quests.description: Mantle structures
quests.shortDescription: I need you to track down my old muscle, Fish Thicc. First step: develop a rep by doing some reps. - Nolan

quests.name: Gain the effects from Slap Splash or Slap Barrels
quests.description: Gain the effects from Slap Splash or Slap Barrels
quests.shortDescription: I hear Fish Thicc's trying to start a... Slap Juice franchise? Try posing as a Slap enthusiast. Be convincing. - Nolan

quests.name: Invite Fish Thicc to the heist crew
quests.description: Invite Fish Thicc to the heist crew
quests.shortDescription: We've baited the hook. Go tell my fine, finned friend I've got the offer of a lifetime for him. - Nolan

quests.name: Travel distance on a Rocket Ram or under the effects of Slap
quests.description: Travel distance on a Rocket Ram or under the effects of Slap
quests.shortDescription: If we're doing this, brah, you gotta distribute the product... FAST! - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Assist with destroying Slurp Trucks or Slurp Barrels
quests.description: Assist with destroying Slurp Trucks or Slurp Barrels
quests.shortDescription: You know what the first rule of business is, brah? MARKET SHARE! And Slurp's got too MUCH! - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Eliminate opponents at Slappy Shores or Hot Spots
quests.description: Eliminate opponents at Slappy Shores or Hot Spots
quests.shortDescription: Sometimes in business, you gotta TAKE OUT THE COMPETITION! - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Talk to Diamond Diva, Heartbreak Ranger, and Renegade Shadow
quests.description: Talk to Diamond Diva, Heartbreak Ranger, and Renegade Shadow
quests.shortDescription: Now, you go out there and SELL. THAT. SLAP!! - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Destroy objects with a Rocket Ram or Pickaxe at Mega City, Rumble Ruins or Shattered Slabs
quests.description: Destroy objects with a Rocket Ram or Pickaxe at Mega City, Rumble Ruins or Shattered Slabs
quests.shortDescription: This Kado Thorne guy wrecked my rep. So I'm gonna wreck his stuff!! - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Beg Nolan Chance for a loan
quests.description: Beg Nolan Chance for a loan
quests.shortDescription: We need Bars for our lil gym. You're tight with Nolan Chance, right? I'm not saying we need his help... but we NEED his help. - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Assist in eliminating Dealers
quests.description: Assist in eliminating Dealers
quests.shortDescription: If we gotta do Nolan's busywork to get the cash for our lil coral buddies, brah, then we gotta. - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Fish up and collect Coral Buddy gym equipment
quests.description: Fish up and collect Coral Buddy gym equipment
quests.shortDescription: With Nolan's Bars in hand, time to get some sea-worthy equipment for the coral buddies!  - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Place gym equipment in Fish Thicc's basement aquarium
quests.description: Place gym equipment in Fish Thicc's basement aquarium
quests.shortDescription: Are you trained as, like, an interior designer for gyms? Anyhow, go nuts! - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Invite Coral Buddies to Fish Thicc's new gym
quests.description: Invite Coral Buddies to Fish Thicc's new gym
quests.shortDescription: Tell the coral buddies: it's time to get SWOLE! And I've got some teeny tiny self-defense lesson plans, too. - Fish Thicc

quests.name: Officially recruit Fish Thicc to the heist crew
quests.description: Officially recruit Fish Thicc to the heist crew
quests.shortDescription: Don't let the fish forget, "brah": he owes me a heist. - Nolan
